Greedy Joker.Effect: Played cards with Diamond suit give +3 Mult when scored

Lusty Joker.Effect: Played cards with Heart suit give +3 Mult when scored

Wrathful Joker.Effect: Played cards with Spade suit give +3 Mult when scored

Gluttonous Joker.Effect: Played cards with Club suit give +3 Mult when scored

Jolly Joker.Effect: +8 Mult if played hand contains a Pair

Zany Joker.Effect: +12 Mult if played hand contains a Three of a Kind

Mad Joker.Effect: +10 Mult if played hand contains a Two Pair

Crazy Joker.Effect: +12 Mult if played hand contains a Straight

Droll Joker.Effect: +10 Mult if played hand contains a Flush

Sly Joker.Effect: +50 Chips if played hand contains a Pair

Wily Joker.Effect: +100 Chips if played hand contains a Three of a Kind

Clever Joker.Effect: +80 Chips if played hand contains a Two Pair

Devious Joker.Effect: +100 Chips if played hand contains a Straight

Crafty Joker.Effect: +80 Chips if played hand contains a Flush

Half Joker.Effect: +20 Mult if played hand contains 3 or fewer cards

Joker Stencil.Effect: X1 Mult for each empty Joker slot. Joker Stencil included (Currently X1)

Four Fingers.Effect: All Flushes and Straights can be made with 4 cards

Mime.Effect: Retrigger all card held in hand abilities

Ceremonial Dagger.Effect: When Blind is selected, destroy Joker to the right and permanently add double its sell value to it's Mult (Currently +0 Mult)

Marble Joker.Effect: Adds one Stone card to the deck when Blind is selected

Loyalty Card.Effect: X4 Mult every 6 hands played 5 remaining

8 Ball.Effect: 1 in 4 chance for each played 8 to create a Tarot card when scored (Must have room)

Dusk.Effect: Retrigger all played cards in final hand of the round

Raised Fist.Effect: Adds double the rank of lowest ranked card held in hand to Mult

Fibonacci.Effect: Each played Ace, 2, 3, 5, or 8 gives +8 Mult when scored

Steel Joker.Effect: Gives X0.2 Mult for each Steel Card in your full deck (Currently X1 Mult)
Steel Joker.Unlock Requirement: Available from start. (Can only appear in the shop when there is a Steel Card in the deck.)

Scary Face.Effect: Played face cards give +30 Chips when scored

Abstract Joker.Effect: +3 Mult for each Joker card (Currently +0 Mult)

Delayed Gratification.Effect: Earn $2 per discard if no discards are used by end of the round

Pareidolia.Effect: All cards are considered face cards

Gros Michel.Effect: +15 Mult 1 in 6 chance this is destroyed at the end of round.

Even Steven.Effect: Played cards with even rank give +4 Mult when scored (10, 8, 6, 4, 2)

Odd Todd.Effect: Played cards with odd rank give +31 Chips when scored (A, 9, 7, 5, 3)

Scholar.Effect: Played Aces give +20 Chips and +4 Mult when scored

Business Card.Effect: Played face cards have a 1 in 2 chance to give $2 when scored

Supernova.Effect: Adds the number of times poker hand has been played this run to Mult

Ride the Bus.Effect: This Joker gains +1 Mult per consecutive hand played without a scoring face card (Currently +0 Mult)

Space Joker.Effect: 1 in 4 chance to upgrade level of played poker hand

Egg.Effect: Gains $3 of sell value at end of round

Burglar.Effect: When Blind is selected, gain +3 Hands and lose all discards

Blackboard.Effect: X3 Mult if all cards held in hand are Spades or Clubs

Runner.Effect: Gains +15 Chips if played hand contains a Straight (Currently +0 Chips)

Ice Cream.Effect: +100 Chips -5 Chips for every hand played

DNA.Effect: If first hand of round has only 1 card, add a permanent copy to deck and draw it to hand

Splash.Effect: Every played card counts in scoring

Blue Joker.Effect: +2 Chips for each remaining card in deck (Currently +104 Chips)

Sixth Sense.Effect: If first hand of round is a single 6, destroy it and create a Spectral card (Must have room)

Constellation.Effect: This Joker gains X0.1 Mult every time a Planet card is used (Currently X1 Mult)

Hiker.Effect: Every played card permanently gains +5 Chips when scored

Faceless Joker.Effect: Earn $5 if 3 or more face cards are discarded at the same time

Green Joker.Effect: +1 Mult per hand played -1 Mult per discard (Currently +0 Mult)

Superposition.Effect: Create a Tarot card if poker hand contains an Ace and a Straight (Must have room)

To Do List.Effect: Earn $4 if poker hand is a [Poker Hand], poker hand changes at end of round

Cavendish.Effect: X3 Mult 1 in 1000 chance this card is destroyed at the end of round
Cavendish.Unlock Requirement: Available from start. (Can only appear in the shop when Gros Michel has destroyed itself in the current run.)

Card Sharp.Effect: X3 Mult if played poker hand has already been played this round

Red Card.Effect: This Joker gains +3 Mult when any Booster Pack is skipped (Currently +0 Mult)

Madness.Effect: When Small Blind or Big Blind is selected, gain X0.5 Mult and destroy a random Joker (Currently X1 Mult)

Square Joker.Effect: This Joker gains +4 Chips if played hand has exactly 4 cards (Currently 0 Chips)

SÃ©ance.Effect: If poker hand is a Straight Flush, create a random Spectral card (Must have room)

Riff-Raff.Effect: When Blind is selected, create 2 Common Jokers (Must have room)

Vampire.Effect: This Joker gains X0.1 Mult per scoring Enhanced card played, removes card Enhancement (Currently X1 Mult)

Shortcut.Effect: Allows Straights to be made with gaps of 1 rank (ex: 10 8 6 5 3)

Hologram.Effect: This Joker gains X0.25 Mult every time a playing card is added to your deck (Currently X1 Mult)

Vagabond.Effect: Create a Tarot card if hand is played with $4 or less

Baron.Effect: Each King held in hand gives X1.5 Mult

Cloud 9.Effect: Earn $1 for each 9 in your full deck at end of round (Currently $4)

Rocket.Effect: Earn $1 at end of round. Payout increases by $2 when Boss Blind is defeated

Obelisk.Effect: This Joker gains X0.2 Mult per consecutive hand played without playing your most played poker hand (Currently X1 Mult)

Midas Mask.Effect: All played face cards become Gold cards when scored

Luchador.Effect: Sell this card to disable the current Boss Blind

Photograph.Effect: First played face card gives X2 Mult when scored

Gift Card.Effect: Add $1 of sell value to every Joker and Consumable card at end of round

Turtle Bean.Effect: +5 hand size, reduces by 1 each round

Erosion.Effect: +4 Mult for each card below [the deck's starting size] in your full deck (Currently +0 Mult)

Reserved Parking.Effect: Each face card held in hand has a 1 in 2 chance to give $1

Mail-In Rebate.Effect: Earn $5 for each discarded [rank], rank changes every round

To the Moon.Effect: Earn an extra $1 of interest for every $5 you have at end of round

Hallucination.Effect: 1 in 2 chance to create a Tarot card when any Booster Pack is opened (Must have room)

Fortune Teller.Effect: +1 Mult per Tarot card used this run (Currently +0)

Stone Joker.Effect: Gives +25 Chips for each Stone Card in your full deck (Currently +0 Chips)
Stone Joker.Unlock Requirement: Available from start. (Can only appear in the shop when there is a Stone Card in the deck.)

Lucky Cat.Effect: This Joker gains X0.25 Mult every time a Lucky card successfully triggers (Currently X1 Mult)
Lucky Cat.Unlock Requirement: Available from start. (Can only appear in the shop when there is a Lucky Card in the deck.)

Baseball Card.Effect: Uncommon Jokers each give X1.5 Mult

Bull.Effect: +2 Chips for each $1 you have (Currently +0 Chips)

Diet Cola.Effect: Sell this card to create a free Double Tag

Trading Card.Effect: If first discard of round has only 1 card, destroy it and earn $3

Flash Card.Effect: This Joker gains +2 Mult per reroll in the shop (Currently +0 Mult)

Spare Trousers.Effect: This Joker gains +2 Mult if played hand contains a Two Pair (Currently +0 Mult)

Ancient Joker.Effect: Each played card with [suit] gives X1.5 Mult when scored, suit changes at end of round

Ramen.Effect: X2 Mult, loses X0.01 Mult per card discarded

Walkie Talkie.Effect: Each played 10 or 4 gives +10 Chips and +4 Mult when scored

Seltzer.Effect: Retrigger all cards played for the next 10 hands

Castle.Effect: This Joker gains +3 Chips per discarded [suit] card, suit changes every round (Currently +0 Chips)

Smiley Face.Effect: Played face cards give +5 Mult when scored

Campfire.Effect: This Joker gains X0.25 Mult for each card sold, resets when Boss Blind is defeated (Currently X1 Mult)

Golden Ticket.Effect: Played Gold cards earn $4 when scored
Golden Ticket.Unlock Requirement: Play a 5 card hand that contains only Gold cards. (Can only appear in the shop when there is a Gold Card in the deck.)

Mr. Bones.Effect: Prevents Death if chips scored are at least 25% of required chips; self destructs

Acrobat.Effect: X3 Mult on final hand of round

Sock and Buskin.Unlock Requirement: Play 300 face cards across all runs.

Swashbuckler.Effect: Adds the sell value of all other owned Jokers to Mult (Currently +1 Mult)

Troubadour.Unlock Requirement: Win 5 consecutive rounds by playing only a single hand in each. (Discards are fine.)

Certificate.Effect: When round begins, add a random playing card with a random seal to your hand
Certificate.Unlock Requirement: Have a Gold card with a Gold Seal.

Smeared Joker.Effect: Hearts and Diamonds count as the same suit, Spades and Clubs count as the same suit
Smeared Joker.Unlock Requirement: Have 3 or more Wild Cards in your deck.

Throwback.Effect: X0.25 Mult for each Blind skipped this run (Currently X1 Mult)
Throwback.Unlock Requirement: Continue a run from the Main Menu.

Hanging Chad.Effect: Retrigger first played card used in scoring 2 additional times
Hanging Chad.Unlock Requirement: Beat a Boss Blind with a High Card hand.

Rough Gem.Effect: Played cards with Diamond suit earn $1 when scored
Rough Gem.Unlock Requirement: Have at least 30 Diamonds in your deck

Bloodstone.Effect: 1 in 2 chance for played cards with Heart suit to give X1.5 Mult when scored

Arrowhead.Effect: Played cards with Spade suit give +50 Chips when scored
Arrowhead.Unlock Requirement: Have at least 30 Spades in your deck

Onyx Agate.Effect: Played cards with Club suit give +7 Mult when scored
Onyx Agate.Unlock Requirement: Have at least 30 Clubs in your deck

Glass Joker.Effect: This Joker gains X0.75 Mult for every Glass Card that is destroyed (Currently X1 Mult)

Showman.Effect: Joker, Tarot, Planet, and Spectral cards may appear multiple times

Flower Pot.Effect: X3 Mult if poker hand contains a Diamond card, Club card, Heart card, and Spade card

Blueprint.Effect: Copies ability of Joker to the right

Wee Joker.Effect: This Joker gains +8 Chips when each played 2 is scored (Currently +0 Chips)
Wee Joker.Unlock Requirement: Win a run in 18 or fewer rounds.

Merry Andy.Unlock Requirement: Win a run in 12 or fewer rounds

Oops! All 6s.Effect: Doubles all listed probabilities (ex: 1 in 3 -> 2 in 3)
Oops! All 6s.Unlock Requirement: Earn at least 10,000 Chips in a single hand.

The Idol.Effect: Each played [rank] of [suit] gives X2 Mult when scored; Card changes every round
The Idol.Unlock Requirement: In one hand, earn at least 1,000,000 Chips.

Seeing Double.Effect: X2 Mult if played hand has a scoring Club card and a scoring card of any other suit
Seeing Double.Unlock Requirement: Play a hand that contains four 7 of Clubs. Other suits that count as clubs (e.g. wild suits) with rank 7 will also count.

Matador.Effect: Earn $8 if played hand triggers the Boss Blind ability
Matador.Unlock Requirement: Defeat a Boss Blind in one hand, without using discards.

Hit the Road.Effect: This Joker gains X0.5 Mult for every Jack discarded this round (Currently X1 Mult)
Hit the Road.Unlock Requirement: Discard 5 Jacks at the same time.

The Duo.Effect: X2 Mult if played hand contains a Pair
The Duo.Unlock Requirement: Win a run without playing a Pair.

The Trio.Effect: X3 Mult if played hand contains a Three of a Kind
The Trio.Unlock Requirement: Win a run without playing a Three of a Kind.

The Family.Effect: X4 Mult if played hand contains a Four of a Kind
The Family.Unlock Requirement: Win a run without playing a Four of a Kind.

The Order.Effect: X3 Mult if played hand contains a Straight
The Order.Unlock Requirement: Win a run without playing a Straight.

The Tribe.Effect: X2 Mult if played hand contains a Flush
The Tribe.Unlock Requirement: Win a run without playing a Flush.

Stuntman.Unlock Requirement: Earn at least 100 million (100,000,000) Chips in a single hand.

Invisible Joker.Effect: After 2 rounds, sell this card to Duplicate a random Joker (Currently 0/2) (Removes Negative from copy)
Invisible Joker.Unlock Requirement: Win a game while never having more than 4 jokers.

Brainstorm.Effect: Copies the ability of leftmost Joker

Satellite.Effect: Earn $1 at end of round per unique Planet card used this run

Cartomancer.Effect: Create a Tarot card when Blind is selected (Must have room)

Astronomer.Effect: All Planet cards and Celestial Packs in the shop are free

Burnt Joker.Effect: Upgrade the level of the first discarded poker hand each round

Bootstraps.Effect: +2 Mult for every $5 you have (Currently +0 Mult)
Bootstraps.Unlock Requirement: Have at least 2 Polychrome Jokers at the same time.

Canio.Effect: This Joker gains X1 Mult when a face card is destroyed (Currently X1 Mult)
Canio.Unlock Requirement: Find this Joker from the Soul card.

Triboulet.Effect: Played Kings and Queens each give X2 Mult when scored
Triboulet.Unlock Requirement: Find this Joker from the Soul card.
